𒆧 ≈ 𒌋𒋰·𒌍 ≈ 𒍨 ≈ 𒋰𒌋𒋰·𒌍 ⚠️ MUCH SIMPLIFIED

𒆧 ≈ 𒄊 ≠ 𒈜 ≠ 𒍽

𒆧 KIŠ kis/qis/kiś/kiš/qiš

  1. 𒆧 Kish
  2. 𒆧 cosmos 𓎟 Universe uni-kursa kasse tasse 𓎡 totality
  3. 𒆧 Geiss / Ghost? ⇔
  4. 𒆧𒉿 kišpi gossip godspell witchcraft

𒄑 GIŠ 𒋢 KUŠ 𒆧 QIŠ 𒆧𒌅 KIS-TU forest @ coast

𒆧 ≈ 𒌋𒋰·𒌍 C•∑ ≈ KIŚ(ma)

𒆧𒌅 KIS-TU > 𒄑 GIŠ చెట్టు ceṭṭu కట్టె kaṭṭe காடு (kāṭu) കാട് (/kaːʈɨ̆/) ಕಾಡು (kāḍu) "forest"
𒆧𒌅 qiršt | forest | حرش ḥirš > Forst forest حِرْش ḥirš ⇔ Hirsch

𒁉 𒃻 𒉿 kaš-šá-pi caspar:sourcer ה 𓂓 𓇋 𓇋 𓏛 𓀭
𒁉 𒉺𒅁 𒋾 kaš-šap-ti:sorceress ה 𓂓 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓏛 𓀭
𒁉 𒃻 𒉿 kaš-šá-pi ⇔ kiš-pi 𒆧 𒉿 sorcery

𒂍𒊬𒀀 E-sara "House of the Universe" ⇔ 𒆧𒆠 kish

𒆧𒆠 Kiški Kish important archaeological site in Babil Governorate
